price: 24.Diggah nabiyow nanu nummal koo rubne moominiin ayti-kumusak koros meesiisak, kaadu hcbcltoh ummatta matan tet addah meesiisé yemeeteeh warree kaa akke waytek.
arabic: وَمَا يَسۡتَوِي ٱلۡأَحۡيَآءُ وَلَا ٱلۡأَمۡوَٰتُۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُسۡمِعُ مَن يَشَآءُۖ وَمَآ أَنتَ بِمُسۡمِعٖ مَّن فِي ٱلۡقُبُورِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: wamā yastawī al-aḥyāu walā al-amwātu inna al-laha yus'miʿu man yashāu wamā anta bimus'miʿin man fī al-qubūri
